name: postman
description:
Make a simplified analogue of "Postman".
1. Ability to add query configurations:
- Request URL (without GET parameters);
- method;
- parameters (multiple key-value pairs);
- the format of the request body (Content-Type);
- body of the request;
- other request headers.
2. Ability to run queries; show:
- http response code;
- response body format (Content-Type);
- response body;
- response headers;
- if possible - a preview of the response body.
It should be possible to send a request and show a response bypassing CORS policy.
Validate all request data.
